verses.verse: And the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> was of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8193>language<s%>, and of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1697>speech<s%>.

And it came to <S%H5265>pass<s%>, as they journeyed from the <S%H6924>east<s%>, that they <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1237>plain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>; and they lived <S%H3427>there<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, Go <S%H3051>to<s%>, let us <S%H3835>make<s%> <S%H3843>brick<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them <S%H8316>thoroughly<s%>. And they had <S%H3843>brick<s%> for <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H2564>tar<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> they for <S%H2563>mortar<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H3051>to<s%>, let us <S%H1129>build<s%> us a <S%H5892>city<s%> and a <S%H4026>tower<s%>, whose <S%H7218>top<s%> may reach unto <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and let us <S%H6213>make<s%> us a <S%H8034>name<s%>, lest we be scattered <S%H6327>abroad<s%> upon the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and the <S%H4026>tower<s%>, which the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5971>Behold<s%>, the people is <S%H259>one<s%>, and they have all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8193>language<s%>; and this they <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>: and now <S%H3808>nothing<s%> will be <S%H1219>restrained<s%> from <S%H2161>them<s%>, which they have imagined to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Go <S%H3051>to<s%>, let us go <S%H3381>down<s%>, and there <S%H1101>confound<s%> their <S%H8193>language<s%>, <S%H834>that<s%> they may not <S%H8085>understand<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>'s <S%H8193>speech<s%>.

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> scattered them <S%H6327>abroad<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> upon the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and they left <S%H2308>off<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

Therefore is the name of <S%H8034>it<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H894>Babel<s%>; because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did there <S%H1101>confound<s%> the <S%H8193>language<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and from there <S%H6327>did<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> scatter them <S%H6327>abroad<s%> upon the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

These are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem<s%>: <S%H8035>Shem<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood<s%>:

And <S%H8035>Shem<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7974>Salah<s%>:

And <S%H775>Arphaxad<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H2425>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H5677>Eber<s%>:

And <S%H7974>Salah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H6389>Peleg<s%>:

And <S%H5677>Eber<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7466>Reu<s%>:

And <S%H6389>Peleg<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H7466>Reu<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H8286>Serug<s%>:

And <S%H7466>Reu<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H8286>Serug<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>:

And <S%H8286>Serug<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%>:

And <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6240>nineteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.
And <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>, and <S%H2039>Haran<s%>.

Now these are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah<s%>: <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>, and <S%H2039>Haran<s%>; and <S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%>.

And <S%H2039>Haran<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8646>Terah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of his <S%H4138>nativity<s%>, in <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H5152>Nahor<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%>: the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>; and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, and the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3252>Iscah<s%>.
But <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> was <S%H6135>barren<s%>; she had no <S%H2056>child<s%>.

And <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2039>Haran<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his daughter in <S%H3618>law<s%>, his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>; and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> with them from <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldees<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2771>Haran<s%>, and lived <S%H3427>there<s%>.
And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8646>Terah<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: and <S%H8646>Terah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran<s%>.
